body_html: Gradient penalty requires computing second order derivatives, and just like computing the first one is 2-3x more expensive than the actual computation, the second one is 2-3x more expensive again, yielding a 4-9x slowdown. Closing as not a bug.
body_text: Gradient penalty requires computing second order derivatives, and just like computing the first one is 2-3x more expensive than the actual computation, the second one is 2-3x more expensive again, yielding a 4-9x slowdown. Closing as not a bug.
body: Gradient penalty requires computing second order derivatives, and just like computing the first one is 2-3x more expensive than the actual computation, the second one is 2-3x more expensive again, yielding a 4-9x slowdown. Closing as not a bug.
